interpretation:
The flag of Belgium represents the unity and integration of its diverse population, coming together to form a prosperous nation. This card represents the power of cooperation and the strength that comes from diversity. It encourages you to embrace differences and work towards a common goal, as this will lead to success and prosperity. 

Belgium is known for its rich cultural heritage and this card symbolizes the beauty of different cultures and traditions coming together to create a unique identity. It also reminds you to be proud of your own heritage and to celebrate the diversity around you.

This card suggests that you may need to work on building stronger relationships and finding common ground with those around you. By embracing differences and working together, you can achieve great things. This card encourages you to be open-minded, understanding, and respectful towards others, as this will lead to harmony and success in all aspects of your life.
